website_summaries.verdict: A dependable, pro-grade kit from a reputable manufacturer. The best rotary tool available.
pros: High torque guaranteed via electronic feedback system
cons: Some customers have had quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions!! So many reviews stating theirs died. Question is: did you follow the initial setup instructions? They tell you to run the Dremel on high, at the highest RPM, for 5 minutes with no load on it. I did this and could hear the unit running smoother as the 5 minutes went on. I then read to do the flexible attachment on high, hanging straight, for 2 minutes. I did this as well. Then I started using it and put some major loads on it and had no issues. Still works like a charm! Great kit and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and over rated.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the work horse of Dremel tools from days gone by. If you use it for any thing that requires much torque (cut off wheels) it gets very hot and then smokes. Apparently once you let the smoke out, it doesn't work anymore. :}. Dremel did replace it, but I had to pay shipping. Once it's out of warranty, I'll be screwed. I'll try something different next time.
customer_reviews.author: Fly

customer_reviews.title: Trying a cheapy
customer_reviews.text: Had a Dremel for years, liked it, and it finally expired. A good stout machine for its size, so I spent the big bucks and got one with all the accessories. Bad choice. It is powerless, cable shaft slips even without a workload. Actually, a workload compared with old unit, can't be applied. Dremel seems to be living off of old reputation without making supporting contribution.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd times a charm?
customer_reviews.text: This would be the 3rd dremel I've attempted to use and all 3 have performed the same. The moment I plug it in, and use it, so begins the ever short lived and sudden death of my series 4000. One use, out of all three. How is it possible you ask? Well so do I...
customer_reviews.author: Ally/Sean

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: The collet nut opening is too small to accommodate the shaft of the accessories. Also when using the handheld tool two collets are required but only one was included. I’m guessing some parts weren’t shipped. Based on the mostly positive reviews, my experience is probably an isolated experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Keifer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Fist product that arrived had a commutation problem and would hickup periodically while on. Amazon replaced it. I received a second one but the same thing was happening but to a much lesser extent so I just kept it since I needed it to get somethings done. The EZ-Lock mechanism is worthless. I must have ruined at least 3 cutting wheels where the center shaft just dissociated itself from the cutting wheel. I broke another grinding wheel very easily. I must be a big oaf breaking all these accessories. Anyway, quality questionable. Very cheap enclosure. Expected more from a name brand Dremel.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Flex shaft requires accessory sold separately
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it enough to really review it, but it should be more clearly stated in the description that the flex shaft included in this kit cannot be used unless you buy a separate stand to hang the motor unit from. Those only cost $10, but it’s annoying all the same to think you’re buying a comprehensive kit and find yourself lacking something that important.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality! Don’t buy it...
customer_reviews.text: I just used it a couple of times and suddenly stop working. My 3 month warranty just finished. I’ll have to see how to fix it. Bad product, don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good Addition to Tools set.
customer_reviews.text: Really Handy tool the kit itself includes a lot of accessories which are really helpful in doing different jobs. And its small and precise for delicate work that's the reason that I bought it. the rpm control is a really great feature to have. Quality of the product is really good been using for 3 years now and its working fine. Its a excellent equipment to have around. One star I deducted for its price could have been a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: R.Baloch

customer_reviews.title: Good power, great tool
customer_reviews.text: Good power, great tool... for just shy of a year. My old Dremel lasted over 20 years. I have a bunch of Dremel accessories so I'm kinda stuck with the brand now... and the quality obviously isn't the same anymore... sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli V.

customer_reviews.title: Its broken on me twice in 3 months. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Its broken on me twice in 3 months. I got a brand new one from amazon as a replacement and it broke maybe a month later. Absolutely garbage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Flex shaft is made cheap
customer_reviews.text: The nose twist cap has plastic threads and the shaft got hot enough to melt the threads on the cap and the threads that the twist nose cap screws on to. If the threads were metal this would not have happened. You can not replace the part with the plastic threads on the hand held device as it is permanently attached. I purchased the Dremel with flex shaft about 30 days ago. If the shaft got hot because of lack of grease, you would think the grease provided when purchased would last at least one month. The Dremel 4000 itself, so far, is fine. My issue is with the flex shaft
customer_reviews.author: Ken Abel

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing. YOU NEED to run these without anything in them for 5 minutes on high straight out of the box to balance the motor and accessories for the dremel. Great power The one star comments most likely didn’t read the instructions and the warranty is good on these IF you register it(takes 4 minutes) stop saying you can’t return it. They’ll replace it after 30 days for a 5 dollar shipping price
customer_reviews.author: dch

customer_reviews.title: If you own one, no description is necessary
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, and SO (!!!) versatile. A definite "must have" for your home toolkit. Beside the Dremel website videos, are many YouTube videos showing how to safely mount and use some of the different accessories. I first used this to cut off and old, broken, unnecessary "backflow preventer valve" on an outside faucet. Worked like a charm, and instead of just paying a plumber or handyman to do that, I now OWN this tool for future use around the house. It's already come in handy many times. Local hardware stores and megastores (like Lowe's and Home Depot) carry spare parts, or you can order directly from Dremel via mail or online.
customer_reviews.author: LvgZombie

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of quality tools.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Dremel kit! I've owned a few Dremels and other rotory tools over the years. This is the best one yet. The manual has all the important speeds for the different bits and other information that makes it worth keeping. The case is sturdy and keeps everything pleasantly organized. They didn't skimp out on the assortment of included bits and cutting blades. This is a must have for any workshop, studio, or garage.
customer_reviews.author: Marc T

customer_reviews.title: It's a Dremel
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a Dremel! I have used this for small projects multiple times now and have had zero issues. I read the instructions prior to utilizing and performed the suggested "break in" procedure. I particularly enjoy some of the accessories that are included with this item. Although, I have only used a couple of them so far. Overall an amazing product that will no doubt make my life and completing small projects much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great for just about anything and has the ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life!?! This thing is great for just about anything and has the ability to get into tight places where you can't reach w/ other tools. I bought this for a massive sanding project due to not being able to get into small crevices even w/ a mouse sander. I'm a perfectionist so I wanted ALL paint gone and a good surface for stain adhesion. I feel like this is a MUST have for any handyman or hobbyist because of all the uses you get from one tool.
customer_reviews.author: NateTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Rotary tool necessities
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased cheaper rotary tool kits in the past and have been severely disappointed. I don't use them for too much or push them incredibly hard. I used this kit to do some modification work on some computer cases and to etch some acrylic. It works incredibly well and has held up remarkably well compared to some of the other reviews. I purchased the 4000-6/50 set. It comes with everything that you could possibly want, an EZ-Lock mandril is included as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price on a full set.
customer_reviews.text: I love this dremel set. You cannot beat this price for a set that comes with the flex shaft and keyless chuck included. This tool can do everything. I personally use it for jewelry making and carving. Also, great for small home improvement projects. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Boe

customer_reviews.title: No more problems
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank the staff of Amazon (and Dremel) for their help and quick response to a problem I had. The spindle was out of balance and vibrated something awful. Dremel told me it needed replaced which is what Amazon did, and in two days I had a new one that runs as smooth as silk. So thanks to the tech support from Dremel for asking the right questions about the problems I had and to Amazon for their quick response. I know this was not so much a product review as it was a Big Thank You to companies that still care about it's costumers.
customer_reviews.author: RAH

customer_reviews.title: You never knew you needed one until you have one!
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was expecting when purchasing a DREMEL. 100% quality and a great value. Even moreso since this was on sale! Now if only my dogs loved it as much as I do-hahaha! I bought it originally to use as a nail trimmer and while it works perfectly for the job with the little flex tool, my dogs are not the biggest fans. I'll just have to give them some time to get used to it though. Other than that I can't wait to use it to make all kinds of things and work on all kinds of projects!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: worked once then died
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after only a few uses and at a low speed. i am so disappointed. i'm going to lose a lot of money this october because I wanted this for carving foam pumpkins. i already bought a bunch and now my tool for carving is completely dead. i took very good care of it from day one and it just died. now i have orders i cant complete so this is very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: RockaRolla Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great to trim dog's nails
customer_reviews.text: We keep meaning to use this for projects but right now it's used only to trim our dog's nails. We had tried EVERYTHING to clip his nails and we couldn't take it anymore. Even our vet couldn't trim them. It still takes two of us to hold him down and keep his arms and paw steady, but once he's used to the sound and feeling on his nail he stays relatively calm if we keep reassuring him. Fortunately he's not afraid of having his nails trimmed (as much) and we can keep them to a manageable and healthy length without clipping them too short and making them bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: This was on Deal of the Day for a good price so I got it as an upgrade for ...
customer_reviews.text: To me, The Dremel tool is something that is well though-out. Sometimes you just need a little tool for a little job. Actually, I probably use the cutting wheels more than anything else. I have used the ceramics and wood cutters quite a bit, too. This was on Deal of the Day for a good price so I got it as an upgrade for the new ez lock mounting and arbor nut holder. I permanently put in old one in a dremel vise. Gotta drill a tiny hole? This is the go-to tool for all small stuff. I used the grinder wheels to sharpen my chain saw.
customer_reviews.author: Shastastan

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I will for my dollmaking. I will be making ball jointed dolls and have heard this brand is reliable. My boyfriend said not to throw it away if I don't use it for dolls. It is a handy tool to have around. I also need to attach my bookshelves to the walls for earthquake preparedness.
customer_reviews.author: Artgal

customer_reviews.title: Better than the last dremel I had
customer_reviews.text: As expected, I have used a dremel for both work around the home and my hobbies. My last one finally stopped working after 15+ years. I chose not to get the cordless one although a number of family members said to get it. So far I sharpened Mower blades, cut pieces for a flooring, trim work and of course what I normally use a dremel for building R/C Planes. Use it for intricate woodworking in building the planes from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Value your time? Get this, to 'git 'er done'
customer_reviews.text: I had been hack-sawing, cold chisling, manufacturing my own tools to try to cut through stainless steel braided high-pressure fuel line for hours, and hours. I finally received this Dremel Tool 4000 Kit, with all the accessories and attachments. I needed it ASAP, and Amazon delivered, along with the terrific UPS route driver, and his trainee. Read up on the usage instructions on the cut-off wheel for hardened steel application, and went through that stainless steel inSECONDS. Compared to the hours I spent trying "hack and pound" my way through it with frayed and useless results, THIS TOOL IS EXCELLENT! Enjoy yours!
customer_reviews.author: Bronco

customer_reviews.title: Super nice kit
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about Dremel? Besides being awesome, this kit has some essential accessories. If I had to complain I guess it would be the case. Some of the accessories don't stay in place in the case, they get tossed around. But I feel like a kid in a candy store looking at the Dremel accessories.
customer_reviews.author: OSCAR

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition!!
customer_reviews.text: Having recently re-entered the model building hobby I needed to outfit my model shop with the right tools for the job,. This was the FIRST tool I bought! It does everything. Drilling holes, polishing delicate plastics, grinding and cutting metal, plastic, tile, you name it. Makes me wonder why everyone does not have one of these. One note... Remember to run the "burn in" cycle when you get it, very important to long life and full service.. Get one, use it, it's a great addition to any work, hobby, or craft shop!
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Love a Dremel
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dremel. The first one my son purchased for me as a Christmas present in the late 1980s or early 1990s. He said at the time that he felt funny giving his mom a Dremel when all his friends gave their moms scarves, perfume, wallets, etc. But I loved my Dremel and still have it, and in fact it still works. This new one has lots more features and will be put to a lot of use as I do love to craft. I can't wait to really use the new one and see what all it can do.
customer_reviews.author: E Persons

customer_reviews.title: It does everything...
customer_reviews.text: I know there's a lot of talk about these things failing and being cheap plastic toys but that is not my experience. It feels solid in my hand and has good power for what it does. I would certainly recommend this for any low torque, high speed applications such as: Cutting thin wood Drilling PCB's and other materials (no bit larger than 1/8") grinding Cleaning/stripping with wire brushes Engraving (fine engraving can be done but it is difficult) knife sharpening (not for the final hone) low level routing One thing that this kit should come with but doesn't is the universal chuck which it the only other thing you really need for small #70 drill bits like I use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin H. Mossberg

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and all you need.
customer_reviews.text: This Dremel came with mostly everything I needed minus some diamond cut bits. But this Dremel is powerful and has adjustable speed setting. It took me awhile shopping online and reading reviews to find a Dremel that would meet all my needs and this is definitely the one. The flexible attachment I have not used yet to do any work but I have tested it out. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to purchase one. Some other dremels come with more advance setting but most of them are really useless to me, I can spare 3 seconds and do things myself for a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: I've read a few reviews that this tool burns out ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read a few reviews that this tool burns out within a months worth of use, if that's the case I'm coming back to change my review. I've had the dremel for 2 weeks now and it's done everything I wanted it for and then some. I've cut bolts to length, fixed a file hanger for a filing cabinet and soon plan to make some cornhole boards utilizing the circle jig and router attachment. Here's to hoping the month long plague doesn't hit me!
customer_reviews.author: koshooter22

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Tool
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this a few months now and used it a good bit. As others have stated, this is a high speed tool, not a high torque one. I've used it for polishing and cleaning a variety of surfaces. I've found it especially useful for cutting plastic. It performs a lot of tasks that I might require an expensive specialized tool. One down side is I've spent a good bit purchasing from the great variety of tools that fit this. One way of thinking of this is as a miniature router. It's a high RPM rotary tool. There are bits for this that are essentially tiny router bits. I especially like the variable speed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mc2

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Used it for sanding the inner corners of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Used it for sanding the inner corners of a coffee table set this past weekend, it saved us a ton of time and effort. DON'T FORGET to read the directions. My dad skipped them and applied force, resulting in a broken and useless part.
customer_reviews.author: Abid Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool from a well known company
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Already came in handy for cutting paneling and helping shape a set of shelves. Things I like, it's extremely versatile! Things to watch out for...well you'll find yourself wanting to do projects that requires additional bits or adaptors and these are somewhat higher priced. Still, I look forward to getting a lot of work out of my dremel.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The motor got extremely hot with light use and then started smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very Usefull
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, it includes just about all the parts and acessories that you would normally need for most projects. The flex shaft is particually nice since it allows you to have a light weight tool in your hands for detail work.
customer_reviews.author: DonR

customer_reviews.title: Take this one for a 'spin'?
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a Dremel before I bought this one, and I had at least half a dozen practical applications in mind when purchasing this. It has easily performed all the functions I bought it for and I constantly end up using it in new ways. This model is very powerful, very fast, and very easy to use. The kit it comes with is fairly sturdy and has some good start-up heads in it. I definitely suggest this model if you need a reliable rotary tool.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Army knife of tools
customer_reviews.text: Hey it's a Dremel. Great tool with more uses than I can think of. I used it to grind rust off baseboard heat covers, cut a nail sticking out of window moulding, grind paint off window closures, drilled starter holes for screws, drove the screws, cut holes in drywall, well you get the idea. Simply a handy, well built multi-use tool.
customer_reviews.author: drblank

customer_reviews.title: dont use it hard it will last forever
customer_reviews.text: The key to these dremels is NOT to use them hard, if you are wanting to trim some nails down or buff out your dads car keys from the 70s it is great. But using it to polish a set of valve covers off your vehicle will burn it up
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Ward

customer_reviews.title: total junk crap
customer_reviews.text: the collet got stuck after a few use and is impossible to remove. The last tool used remains in place forever and is impossible to review. The lock button that is supposed to stop spindle rotation slips no matter how strong you hold it down - I even use a vise.
customer_reviews.author: Hien Le

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. Overpriced and useless.
customer_reviews.text: My husband followed the instructions in the user guide to set up the Dremel. He used the flex attachment for about 5 minutes and the machine overheated and wouldn't power back on.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tool, particularly the flex shaft attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool, particularly the flex shaft attachment (easy to hold, control for detailed work) - recommend the getting the "Dremel 220-01 Rotary Tool Workstation Drill Press Work Station with Wrench" accessory to complement.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Dremel
customer_reviews.text: Great dremel. I've used it for everything from trimming my dogs nails to cutting steel. The quick lock style cut off wheels are not very durable. I have broken everyone of then at the center metal ring that is attached to the cutting material.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: By nothing but the best, and yes this is it.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. After a lot of research I determined to buy the 4000 as compared to the 4200 model. I like this easy twist system much better than the newer system, though I could be wrong. I had just seen many negative reviews for the 4200 approaching more than 50% at some forms. I don't see a real lot of profit and bind the 4200 as this unit has a sane power and features minus any of the negative complaints. This receives the best reviews of a rotary tool I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Lyle Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy, works very well. Being educated about the product and have used it now. I would caution folks to really research the accessories. For example, I'm mostly going to be using it for wood carving. There are only a couple wood carving pieces in this entire kit, so a lot of it will most likely not be used. May behoove some folks to purchase the Dremel itself, and then purchase your bits separate, may save you some cash and give you a better selection of things you really need.
customer_reviews.author: chrometoyota

customer_reviews.title: Great product; love that I finally have the full set
customer_reviews.text: Great product; love that I finally have the full set with all possible attachments included in the package. I was unsure as to whether to get the model with less number of total accessories but trust me this deal is worth it. Getting them separately will cost you more!
customer_reviews.author: Boyan Biandov

customer_reviews.title: A great product from Dremel
customer_reviews.text: I have already used mine several times and it works flawlessly. It would be nice if it were a bit smaller in diameter to make it easier to grip but that is the only complaint I have. It came with a great selection of accessories which have already came in handy. I have yet to use the flexible cable attachment so I cannot comment on it. The built in wrench for loosening/tightening the chuck was an innovative and great way to keep from losing the dreadful wrench as the old models had. It made a great Christmas gift for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: One11

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong! A quality investment with many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool, EVER! I'm in love with it! A 68-yr old woman, it fits well in my hand. I'm amazed at how often I reach for this tool! Highly recommended! A+ workmanship! Be sure to follow the directions and run it wide open for a full 5 minutes! Very important to seat the brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Still love it as my hobby go to tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Still use it since I ordered it in 2015. It's been 5 years and still running strong and helpful to those small and different jobs
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but didn't seem any better than the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and myself as Christmas presents. Nice kit but didn't seem any better than the other two Dremels I own - just a little more advanced and prettier. I like the kit and it comes with the Dremel Flex Shaft attachment. My son uses his in his gun smith business and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite too of all tools.
customer_reviews.text: I love my dremel. I love my dremel. I love my dremel. I use it for materials, crafting, home repairs, and my husband has even used it for work on the car. I actually use it more than my power tools.
customer_reviews.author: Honey of Honey's Life

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome tool. I use it for wood carving mostly, and boy, does it make life easier. Its powerful, and well built. Remember, if you take care of your tools, they'll take care of you!
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dremel 4000
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any handyman/woman. I love every aspect of my Dremel 4000. The machine itself is comfortable to use. I have small hands, and I have no problem working the machine. It has enough power when I need it and a wide variety of attachments. I have a smaller Dremel as well, and this model definitely has more power. The projects you can tackle with this little gem is endless. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any Weekend Warrior. Small cutting tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Must have for any Weekend Warrior. Small cutting tool works wonders for hard to reach areas especially underneath cars/truck; will cut large, rusty, hardened bolts with ease, even while using the flex shaft
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ROTARY TOOL I EVER OWNED!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST ROTARY TOOL THAT I HAVE EVER OWNED! BY FAR IT IS FOR ME OF THE UTMOST SUPERIOR QUALITY!!! DREMEL YOU ARE JUST AMAZING IN THE QUALITY!!!! AND THE WORKMANSHIP!!!! THAT GOES INTO THIS AND ALL OF YOUR OTHER PRODUCTS!! I AM A DIE HARD DREMEL FAN FOR LIFE NOW!! AFTER BUYING THIS DREMEL 4000 ROTARY TOOL KIT!!!! THIS PRODUCT DESERVES WAY MORE THAN 5 STARS!!!! OUTSTANDING QUALITY!!! OUTSTANDING QUALITY!!!! A++++++ I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS DREMEL 4000 TOOL KIT TO ALL OF YOU OUT THERE LOOKING FOR THE BEST TOP OF THE LINE ROTARY TOOL KIT THAT YOUR MONEY CAN BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool with lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: Great tool with lots of uses. Reasonable price. I have used it to clean the carbon from the head of an ATV engine as well as smoothing an imperfection of the ATV's carburetor idle adjustment throttle body. It also worked well removing old gasket debris from small engine parts. I also used the metal cutting discs for making fine cuts in metal. There are almost an unlimited number of uses for this tool. I hope to use it for scrimshaw also.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMichen

customer_reviews.title: Complete Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with more features than I will use. The variety and range of allowable work is great. It will take years for me to have cause to use all the components. From what we use and that of others who have the same tool we have a large collection of bits and parts in storage. A smaller collection of several of the same bits that we use frequently. Hind sight says buy the motor, the flex shaft and a smaller variety of perceived useful bits to determine what works for the work being done then expand.
customer_reviews.author: Expect Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dremel my only issue is the attachments don’t have a specific spot And they all just float around in a small area in the box
customer_reviews.author: Chris sawyer 123

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far but it worked very well. Dremels are great products with multiple uses. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jjnew

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good price point ($97) for the accessories that are ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good price point ($97) for the accessories that are included. Flex shaft is a must have in my opinion. Works like a Dremel...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been looking at which dremel set to get and settled with this one. So glad I did! I've used it for several different projects and it has never skipped a beat or bogged down when set at right speed.
customer_reviews.author: DogFish

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tool for on any job at home or work
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Great product at a great price fully satisfied I will be doing business with this seller in the near future. I have already purchased more than one. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Dremel Tool and Wide Variety of Accessories
customer_reviews.text: This Dremel tool is much more powerful than the one I purchased 15 years ago (and still have). A lot of the bits, grinding wheels, etc. you probably won't use, but there is a wide variety in this kit, and you will have the opportunity to see what works for you. Then, you'll be ordering more of those (like the EZ-Lock cutoff wheels, which do a great job and are easy to change out).
customer_reviews.author: James W. Densford III

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, it has delivered for the tasks I needed it. Don't force it onto the surface regardless of the job you're doing and you'll get flawless results. For the price, it's a great catch to have this arsenal at your disposal, I bought it for a certain grout task and ended up using it for cutting and grinding as well on the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Solves impossible tasks
customer_reviews.text: I only liked this when I first got it for Christmas. Lots of cool looking gadgets to do cool stuff with. The only problem is that I never had anything cool to do with it. Then I had to cut / shape an impossible piece of wood for a home project. I can't see any other way I could have gotten this done other than a tool like this. When a tool pays for itself in a single use, it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Great rotary tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Great rotary tool kit. Has a nice amount of variable power and tons of different tools and attachments. I bought it for my husband, but I find I use it just as much as he does and for a wide variety of different projects. I've used other rotary tools that just don't cut it - stick with Dremel brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joiroy

customer_reviews.title: This dremel tool simply works as intended, that's the ...
customer_reviews.text: This dremel tool simply works as intended, that's the bottomline. Pros: Price, performance, number of accessories and warranty. Performs as expected, with absolutely no vibration, and can be gripped properly. The power cable is long and of high quality. All of the attachments work as intended, and the addition of the flex shaft is welcomed. Cons: So far none.
customer_reviews.author: Midas

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Dremel
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Dremel. The tool in and of itself is extremely versatile and handy. Just used it to cut off a 1/4" bolt I could not reach with a saw. I had previously purchased another brand from a 'wholesale' catalog and it did not last more that 15 hours of use. The Dremel, coupled with either a carbide or diamond bit is a great tool for removing grout. I am totally satisfied with the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: The best deal for a corded dremel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a present because i've owned the 4000 for a couple years and its a great version of the dremel. This kit is a better deal than buying the parts separately. For anyone curious, this does have the nose cap Key which allows you to change bits without using the wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Dad

customer_reviews.title: One of the Most Useful Hand Tools Available
customer_reviews.text: My old 120V Dremel tool had finally gotten weak and not too reliable. This new model Dremel comes with lots of useful attachments and suits my needs for a small rotary tool perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L.

customer_reviews.title: Great useful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present. My daughter saw how functional and fun mine was to use and wanted one for her own at her own house. I got her this one because it was a great price and had way more attachments from the one I originally bought from myself. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: very pricey, but good
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little pieces, lots of applications, lots of STUFF to get out and go through. Dremels work great but buy the tool with the job in mind that it will be used for. Buying the one with a box of crap with it because (you might need that piece someday) is dumb and just gives you more crap to sort through to get what you really need done. J m o
customer_reviews.author: kevin mcbee

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything. Sanders, Cutters, Polishers. I used it to cut an opening in my baseboard to put an outlet. Worked fantasticfor the job. I will be using this for many different things. I a have a rust grinding job to do that I have been putting off, now I can get it done quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Dremel Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: The product has improved over the years, a very useful tool. Lots of add-ons (some useful some just for fluff). The case is sturdy enough, maybe not quite large enough, but the inside design of the case is less than ideal. Basically you got your tools, parts, doo-dads, gizmo clip whatnots, all tossing around inside the box (case)... just get use to it. I like my tool.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Ghiglia

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Getting a lot of use out of this. The kit has a ton of accessories; I was pretty surprised how many little jobs this thing can make easier especially those little metal cutting wheels, a real lifesaver those are. The quality is what you would expect from Dremel, the case is decent but the clasps are just plastic so I am expecting those to wear out at some point. A really handy item to have around the house for crafty people and DIY folks like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ... different rotary tools and Dremel is by far my favorite. It feels like a quality built device
customer_reviews.text: I have owned different rotary tools and Dremel is by far my favorite. It feels like a quality built device. It runs well and as long as you don't block the vents, it doesn't get overly warm. Competitors products disappointed me with their speed torque or longevity. So far the dremels that I have replaced have been because of loss, theft or abuse and not the fault of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but then it is a Dremel ( I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but then it is a Dremel ( I bought knock off brands and they are cheaper but overheat and the brush wears out too soon and have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: nersip

customer_reviews.title: Great so Far
customer_reviews.text: So far mine has held up great. I use it for a variety of different stuff. From wood carving, cutting plastic, to Using the buffer pad to remove decals from vehicles. The extension attachment makes maneuverability a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Get it but beware, you might go out of your way to find projects
customer_reviews.text: Got this little baby on sale. Amazon was the cheapest compared to the big name stores but that could change so shop around first. I've been using dremels since I was a little kid and this is only the second I've ever used. It's also the first one I bought myself. I bring that up because they seem to last a long time. My dad has one that's a few years old and that still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Excellnet set.
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been utilizing a hand me down dremel that I recieved from my father when he decided he need to upgrade. While the old black and orange dremel still runs as it has for probably over 15 years, I finally decided that an upgrade was needed. This set has pretty much everything someone needs to get a good amount of use out of the ubiquitous multitool. While I still havent employed nearly half of the many add-ons having them on hand in one set is great for keeping thing organized and readily on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lyall

customer_reviews.title: The original and best for a reason, you will pay for it though
customer_reviews.text: This tool is the perfect starter kit, contains everything that you need to get the job done out of the box. The tool itself is worth the price and the 5 star review, it is easy to handle, tons of variable adjustability, does not heat up, just perfect. The only reason this kit receives 4 stars is due to the attachments which could be a lot better. They wear out fast and are generally over priced. Much better to just buy the base Dremel tool and then get one of the many wonderful accessory kits that amazon sells.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Golubtsov

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Especially the flex shaft for doing wood carving. Im glad I listened to others and didn't go with a cheaper brand. This thing has been flawless! Very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Product as per the description
customer_reviews.text: The contents are as per the original description. The product is original Dremel. Have'nt had the chance to use it yet. Though I did test it when it reached me and everything seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rojoe

customer_reviews.title: This is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this dremel tool. You can buy several extra parts. I really like the variable speed. I use it for crafting. Great for drilling some pieces. Can change part to smooth glass in seconds. Some plastics need lower speeds, smoothed rough plastic parts. I had a similar tool. Could not change parts and only had 1 speed.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son. He is very pleased with it. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to say about the Dremel 4000 is there anything you can’t do with it??
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lummus

customer_reviews.title: Great tool and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! The attachments are excellent and the options of cutting metal, carving wood and sanding bits!
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Great tool - a must have
customer_reviews.text: This Dremel is a upgrade from my previous one.....GREAT TOOL....NICE ATTACHMENTS...SUPER DEAL. Love this DREMEL for precision home projects, plus making fishing lures and various assigned duties on the "Honey Do" list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Dremel
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for small cuts and some woodworking. It has dremeled everything I’ve dremeled with it.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Dremel 4000
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Dremel 4000-6/50 120-Volt Variable-Speed Rotary Kit for my son and I to use on some projects and we have used it once and it worked great,we really like that it has so many optional tools that will help with any project.I received this from the company in a very timely manner and there was no damage to product or package.I will buy from this company again when the need arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older Dremel version with this set and I like all of the accessory items included in this set and the fact that this version has variable speed.
customer_reviews.author: JIM WEAR JR

customer_reviews.title: It has lots of nice attachments that the old one did not have
customer_reviews.text: After 38 years my old Dremel finally gave out. I bought this one to replace it. It has lots of nice attachments that the old one did not have. If this one lasts as long as the last one it will be the last one I ever have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal and a nice piece of equipment that will last a while.
customer_reviews.text: Really needed this Dremel, and it did everything as advertised. My only qualm would have to be the rotary kit included. It advertises a lot of crazy and unique attachments which in all fairness it does have but included in that number are a lot of copies of the same type of blades. Overall still a great buy and a must have in any house or shop for those fine tuning jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Taron Trent Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great tool! Butt loads of attachments
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Butt loads of attachments, and the flex shaft makes this great for detail work! I'm sure you could save a few bucks and go with one of the other kits and add pieces as needed, but I'm really glad I just got it all at once. This set makes it very easy to get into Dremel and not have to worry about making a bunch of hardware store trips once you start finding uses you hadn't planned for.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever for home handyman
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a friend who is always struggling with some handy work around his home. He has told me again and again that he uses it every day for something and can't remember how he managed without it. He's normally hard to buy for but, the Dremel 4000 with all the attachments was the Christmas gift equivalent of a grand slam homerun. I'm hinting that I want one!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm happy with this Dremel
customer_reviews.text: Just received this Dremel and have used it briefly with the flex cable attachment and it works very well. This unit feels a lot nicer than my old one from 20 years ago, time will tell on its usefulness and durability. There are certainly a lot of accessories with this kit and it's price was much lower than other places I checked.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift for my hubby
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. The tools attach and detach easily. It is easy to use, even for me. It takes the place of several other tools and the carrying case makes it easy to take all the attachments and gadgets along with the tool. Hubby had a smaller tool like this before but he needed more attachments and options. This is perfect for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: plfreitag

customer_reviews.title: Do you need a Dremel?  Yes, yes you do.
customer_reviews.text: Do you need Dremel? Yes, yes you do. I live in a small space and this lightweight, space efficient tool can be used for so many tasks that several bigger tools are usually required for. Most often I use it to take heads off stripped screws during small renovation efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Anne North

product_meta.title: Dremel 4000-6/50 High Performance Rotary Tool Kit with Flex Shaft- 6 Attachments & 50 Accessories- Grinder, Mini Sander, Polisher, Engraver- Perfect For Routing, Cutting, Wood Carving
product_meta.description: Style:Rotary tool| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe 4000 variable speed rotary tool offers the highest performance and most versatility of all Dremel rotary tools. The increased strength of its motor plus electronic feedback circuitry delivers consistent performance at all speeds. The slim ergonomic body provides a 360-degree grip zone for control in any position and the separate on/off switch and variable-speed dial allows convenient speed adjustment and maintains a selected speed. It uses all Dremel accessories.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE ROTARY TOOL KIT: includes 4000 corded rotary tool, 6 attachments, 50 high-quality Dremel accessories, deluxe carrying case, and accessory case.
HIGH PERFORMANCE MOTOR – Provides maximum power and performance at all speeds.
VARIABLE SPEED (5,000 – 35,000 RPM) and electronic feedback circuitry for consistent performance even in the most demanding applications.
INNOVATED AIR FLOW SYSTEM- ventilation mechanism helps prevent heat build-up for smoother, cooler, and quieter operation
SLIM & ERGONOMIC BODY – 360-degree grip zone for added comfort & grip during extended use.
SEPARATE ON/OFF SWITCH & SPEED DIAL – for the perfect speed every time.
50 VERSATILE ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: Ideal for DIY or crafting projects like detail sanding, grinding, cutting, carving, variable speed polishing, and drilling.
2 YEAR TOOL WARRANTY & USA-BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Available by chat, email, phone or visit us at our service center in Racine, WI.
6 ATTACHMENTS INCLUDED – 225 Flex Shaft, 678 Circle Cutter & Straight Edge Guide, 565 Multi-Purpose Cutting Guide, 675 Lawn Mower & Garden Tool Sharpener, and A576 Shaping Platform, and A550 Shield

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,541 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
